PRODUCTS_P_1: Make a separate inquiry about installation terms for Mercedes-Benz, BMW, LandRover and VolksWagen cars.
PRODUCTS_P_2: Pandora is a trademark of "Telemetriya" R&D production facility, Kaluga. The company is engaged in development and production of car security and antitheft (alarm) systems.
PRODUCTS_P_3: Currently the main products of the company are "PANDORA" security and antitheft (alarm) systems, as well as "PANDECT" immobilizers.
